ValidationRule.description: Require the assigned deputy to be set at the proper time
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , 'In Review') || ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , 'Approved') ) && NOT ( ISPICKVAL ( Submission_Type__c , 'online') ) && NOT ( ISPICKVAL ( Service_Type__c , 'Renewal' ) ) && ISBLANK ( Assigned_Deputy__c ) && NOT(External_User__c = 1) && NOT ( RecordType.Id = "012t00000008WSn")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please assign a deputy to proceed.
